vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
Demo.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(tokenAddress.call(id,from,toAddresses[i],values[i])) (patch_15.sol#13)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_15.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (patch_15.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Demo.transfer (patch_15.sol#4-16):
	-require(bool)(tokenAddress.call(id,from,toAddresses[i],values[i])) patch_15.sol#13
